About the Company: International Combustion (India) Limited is an India-based company. The Company operates in two segments: mineral and material processing and handling equipment, and gear box and geared motor drive system. It has three manufacturing divisions: Heavy Engineering Division, Polymer Division and Bauer Division. Its products include geared motors and gear boxes, vibrating screens and feeders, bulk material handling equipment, rubber/polyurethane screen decks and liners, raymond grinding mills, air classifiers and flash drying systems..The company also in the business segment of Gear Box and Geared Motor Drive System, Mineral & Material Processing and Handling Equipment.
